basics.name: Woongjib Choi
basics.label: AI Researcher
basics.summary: M.S. candidate at Yonsei University specializing in Digital Signal Processing, Speech Signal Processing, and Generative Models. Experienced in audio compression and generation with a strong publication record.

work.name: Yonsei University, DSPAI Lab
work.summary: Served as a Teaching Assistant for various undergraduate courses in the Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering.
highlights: EEE4610: Electrical and Electronic Engineering Capstone Design (Fall 2024)

work.name: Yonsei University, SRIP Lab
work.summary: Implemented and analyzed image processing algorithms including white balancing, denoising, color interpolation (demosaicing), and super-resolution under the supervision of Prof. Moon Gi Kang.

international_publications.name: UniverSR: Unified and Versatile Audio Super-Resolution via Vocoder-Free Flow Matching
international_publications.summary: Authors: Woongjib Choi, Sangmin Lee, Hyungseob Lim, and Hong-Goo Kang

international_publications.name: Neural Joint Stereo Coding for High Spatial Fidelity via Explicit Binaural Cue Loss Functions
international_publications.summary: Authors: Jaehun Shin, Woongjib Choi, Jihyun Lee, Hyungseob Lim, Inseon Jang, and Hong-Goo Kang

international_publications.name: SAGE-LD: Towards Scalable and Generalizable End-to-End Language Diarization via Simulated Data Augmentation
international_publications.summary: Authors: Sangmin Lee, Woongjib Choi, Jihyun Kim, and Hong-Goo Kang

international_publications.name: Neural Spectral Band Generation for Audio Coding
international_publications.summary: Authors: Woongjib Choi, Byeong Hyeon Kim, Hyungseob Lim, Inseon Jang, and Hong-Goo Kang

domestic_publications.name: DNN-based Speech Codec Enhancement Utilizing Conditional Flow Matching
domestic_publications.summary: Authors: Jaehoon Shin, Woongjib Choi, Byeong Hyeon Kim, Inseon Jang, and Hong-Goo Kang

domestic_publications.name: Non-Blind Speech Bandwidth Extension Using Pre-Trained Self-Supervised Features
domestic_publications.summary: Authors: Woongjib Choi, Byeong Hyeon Kim, and Hong-Goo Kang

projects.name: Context-Aware Time-Scale Modification (TSM) with LLM Guidance
projects.summary: Developed a TSM system that combines the traditional SOLA algorithm with an LLM to selectively control speech speed in important frames for the 'Speech Signal Processing' course.

projects.name: LAUD: Large Language Model as a Universal ASR Decoder
projects.summary: Developed a multilingual ASR framework that utilizes a speech foundation model with the Roman alphabet as a universal intermediate representation for the 'Speech Interface' course.

projects.name: A Technical Overview of Deep Learning Based Single-Image Super-Resolution Methods
projects.summary: Investigated and compared three major categories on single-image super-resolution: external learning-based (e.g., SRGAN), internal learning-based (e.g., ZSSR), and Transformer-based approaches (e.g., SwinIR).

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded for high academic achievement, ranking within the top 3% of the college in Spring 2023.

awards.title: Academic Excellence Scholarship
awards.summary: Recipient for both the Spring 2023 and Fall 2023 semesters based on academic excellence.

extracurricular_activities.organization: Humans of Yonsei (Student Storytelling and Interview Organization)

extracurricular_activities.position: Sergeant, Repair Parts and Tool Supply Specialist

extracurricular_activities.organization: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Yonsei University
